Link.Title: Projects
Link.Description: A list of apps, libs & tools that helps during every day (developer) life.

Link.Title: Projects - All
Link.Description: A complete list of all apps, libs & tools.

Link.Title: Template Engine
Link.Description: It is a proof of concept. It's information system build on UI templates that are compiled to server side .NET assembly and to a javascript.

Link.Title: NTE - Admininistration Demo (Template Engine)
Link.Description: A demo instance of Template Engine administration.

Link.Title: NTE - Frontend Blog Demo (Template Engine)
Link.Description: A demo instance of Template Engine blog.

Link.Title: is4wfw
Link.Description: The is4wfw is a PHP based content management system. It uses custom XML tags for marking places that should be replaced by a dynamic content.

Link.Title: Neptuo
Link.Description: Core utilities and extensions for System.Core.

Link.Title: Neptuo.Web.Localization
Link.Description: A NuGet package for localization of ASP.NET applications using GetText-like syntax.

Link.Title: Build History - Install
Link.Description: Install Visual Studio extension for overviewing builds.

Link.Title: Fast Build Cancellation - Install
Link.Description: Install Visual Studio extension for cancelling build on first error.

Link.Title: Line Duplication - Install
Link.Description: Install Visual Studio extension for line and selection duplication.
